## Validate.splitResourceId() function

Splits a [resource id](./ts-res.resourceid.md) into its component [resource names](./ts-res.resourcename.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function splitResourceId(id: string | undefined): Result<ResourceName[]>;
```

**Returns:**

Result&lt;[ResourceName](./ts-res.resourcename.md)<!-- -->\[\]&gt;

`Success`<!-- -->with an array of [ResourceName](./ts-res.resourcename.md) objects if the ID is valid, or `Failure` with an error message if not.
